meanings.definition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases affecting the gums and supporting structures of the teeth.
meanings.sent1: The periodontists at the clinic are experts in keeping gums healthy.
meanings.sent2: My sister is studying to become one of the periodontists who focus on gum health.
meanings.sent3: The periodontists joked that they were like gardeners, tending to the roots of teeth.
meanings.sent4: The periodontists were the detectives of dental health, uncovering hidden gum issues.
meanings.sent5: I remember the periodontists as the smile doctors, ensuring our gums stay strong.
